response.overview: Ava, a sound engineer, lives far from her family. One day, while recording in the forest, the microphones pick up a strange murmur. Intrigued, she returns to the scene to try to discover its source. Meanwhile, many miles away, her mother struggles with an illness. It's impossible not to think of Apichatpong Weerasethakul with this small and evocative piece about the relativity of distance and the absoluteness of love.
response.title: Allí lejos de aquí
